name: Game & Watch Collection 2
description: Game & Watch Collection 2 is a Club Nintendo reward that was a collection of Game & Watch games. It was the sequel to Game & Watch Collection. In it, you would have to play Parachute on the top screen and Octopus on the bottom. You'll have to catch parachuters on the top screen, then quickly go down in the bottom screen and claim treasure, all while avoiding the octopus.
